work.content:
Small Python program that will generates an HTML page containing all the videos from a folder. Opened with Chrome, the page will make an easy-to-use interface to stream the videos to local Chomecast devices.

I had several interesting challenges working on it:

  • managing a local server for the Chromecast devices to ba able to read the videos ;
  • taking care of all the possible actions of a player (play, pause, stop, change video, restart) in a "remote" context (connection/disconnection to the device) ;
  • generating a good and usable interface in vanilla Javascript.
I'm quite satisfied with the outcome of this small project: even though it's not perfect, I learned a lot of things doing it (and I have now a way to stream local videos to my Chromecast).
